name: KOPITIAM
description:
Made in 24 hours for the HackNRoll22 hackathon organised by NUS Hackers.

Attributions:

PhatRobit for their imposter sprites implementation that was modified for this project.

Unity Packages used: Photon PUN 2, Cinemachine, TextMeshPro2.

The remaining assets (art/music/code) was made by myself with the following programs:

Adobe Animate, TexturePacker, Bosca Ceoil, Audacity, Unity3D and Blender.
